mapper.insert: insert into t_tfs_helptype ( helptype, name, iconimg, orderno, isshow, modifior )values ( #{helpType}, #{name}, #{iconimg}, #{orderNo}, #{isShow}, #{modifior} )
mapper.update:
update t_tfs_helptype
helptype = #{helpType},
name = #{name},
iconimg = #{iconimg},
orderno = #{orderNo},
isshow = #{isShow},
modifior = #{modifior},
modifytime = #{modifyTime},
where helptype = #{helpType}
